article_text: Tom McDonald and Ryan Meyer are the Democratic candidates, and the winner will face no Republican opposition in November. Both candidates support Medicaid expansion.

article_summary:
Both candidates support Medicaid expansion.
Tom McDonald and Ryan Meyer are the Democratic candidates, and the winner will face no Republican opposition in November.
